price: Ó lè jẹ́ pé Olúwa yín máa ṣààánú yín. Tí ẹ bá sì padà (síbi ẹ̀ṣẹ̀), A máa padà (síbi ẹ̀san). A sì ṣe iná Jahanamọ ní ẹ̀wọ̀n fún àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يَرۡحَمَكُمۡۚ وَإِنۡ عُدتُّمۡ عُدۡنَاۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ حَصِيرًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbukum an yarḥamakum wa-in ʿudttum ʿud'nā wajaʿalnā jahannama lil'kāfirīna ḥaṣīran
